thread.title: Tobago to host fashion exhibition in October
thread.title_full: Tobago to host fashion exhibition in October

author: eTN Editor
title: Tobago to host fashion exhibition in October
text:
Tobago to host fashion exhibition in October     
PORT OF SPAIN, Trinidad - The major players in the global fashion industry will descend on Tobago for the Fashion Vanguard Trade Show and Exhibition from October 22-26, 2015. 
Fashion buyers, editors, bloggers and investors from the United States of America, United Kingdom, Tokyo and the Caribbean are expected to attend the exhibition, which will showcase the work of Trinidad and Tobago-based designers of fashion apparel and accessories. 
The event is intended to enable access to key fashion sectors and generate orders for global distribution, which in turn will present Trinidad and Tobago as a suitable and effective channel for inventive fashion designs and production. Among the designers that will be exhibiting at the show are: 
• Kamille Kahn Designs – Sophisticated and versatile handmade accessories made entirely of natural materials. 
• Cee Wee Designs – Handcrafted clutches and handbags made of natural fibers and incorporating Caribbean colors. 
• Movementbago – Trendy street wear inspired by the island of Tobago and made for all. Designed by Nicollette Leacock. 
• Ted Arthur – Ted Arthur is a craftsman with very distinguished clients – Queen Elizabeth I, US President Barrack Obama and his wife, Richard Branson, Natalie Cole, Chaka Khan and India Arie. For over 20 years, Arthur has worked with different types of leather to produce “one of a kind” quality products in shoes, handbags and slippers for the domestic and international markets. 
• Delia Alleyne – A sewing tutor for the US television programme, Project Runway, Delia’s designs are edgy, well-tailored and timeless. 
Vice Versa Fashion Company, a full service Caribbean Fashion Management company that focuses on developing sustainable, export-ready fashion brands through innovative fashion management solutions, is hosting Fashion Vanguard Tobago. For more information, contact Fashion Vanguard:
